QuestData.Title: The Sentinel's Pawn
QuestData.Description: We found this small red statue on the corpse of one of those Explorers' League archaeologists. Sadly, it wasn't us who killed him. The local wildlife had already taken care of that.$b$bThe statue is well-crafted, but apparently bereft of magical power. You may use it for whatever means you deem necessary.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a use for the Sentinel's Pawn within the Tomb of the Watchers in the Badlands.
QuestData.RewardText: <The statue slides into place on the cold marble slab.>
